title: The Shining Hotel Has Big Plans To Become The Scariest Place You've Ever Visited
text:
The Shining Hotel Has Big Plans To Become The Scariest Place You've Ever Visited 
Published By: CinemaBlend.com - Today 
We’ve all stayed in some petrifying hotels during our travels. None of this is actually by design, it’s just something you learn...
